definition: to regard as unimportant/to be indifferent to (fame, wealth etc)/(of an economy or a market) to slacken
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
insipid/diluted/weak/mild/light in color/tasteless/indifferent/(variant of 氮[dan4]) nitrogen

sentences.english: Through the world, see light the world.
Gains and losses at work slowly dim view of the heart, no longer complain of.
sentences.chinese: 在工作中得失心慢慢的看淡了，也不再怨天尤人了。

sentences.english: To all bearish, and miss is not so tired.
sentences.chinese: 把一切看淡了，想念也就不那么累。

sentences.english: Such as the time in the past twenty years, I think something has to look at the light.
sentences.chinese: 等时光再过去二十年，我想有些事情已经看淡了。

sentences.english: Laughter is a realm of life is a dim view of all the mind.
sentences.chinese: 笑对人生是一种境界，是一种看淡一切的胸怀。

sentences.english: They had all faced down death and decided to live every day like it might be their last.
sentences.chinese: 她们都看淡死亡，下决心将每一天当做最后一天来过。

definition: to come to accept an unpleasant fact/to get over sth/to cheer up
to let nature take its course (idiom)
to see through the world of mortals (idiom, of Buddhist monk)/disillusioned with human society/to reject the world for a monastic life
levelheadedness/calmness/equanimity
not to become attached to material things, not to pity oneself
pinyin: bu4 yi3 wu4 xi3 , bu4 yi3 ji3 bei1

definition: optimistic/sanguine/generous/magnanimous/open-minded
to not take to heart/to be free of worried thoughts/to adopt a lighthearted perspective/lighthearted
ephemeral (idiom)
satisfied with what one has (idiom)
fame and profit
to achieve supreme enlightenment or nirvana (Buddhism)
to be at peace with oneself
to handle the situation calmly (idiom)/unruffled/to treat the situation lightly
living a simple life
position and wealth (idiom); rank, fame and fortune
at home wherever one is (idiom); ready to adapt/flexible/to accept circumstances with good will
